com.ulflander.processors.augment
Class BasicTextStatResult

java.lang.Object
  com.ulflander.minethat.model.AnalysisResult
      com.ulflander.processors.augment.BasicTextStatResult

public class BasicTextStatResult
extends AnalysisResult

This classe store some flobal metrics about a document (number of tokens, paragraphs, sentences, average of token per sentence...) and provides a comprehensible and readable summary about those statistics.

Since:
2/21/14
Author:
Ulflander
